Short description (less than 160 charact: Canyon Ranch Woodside is a top wellness retreat in California, offering exclusive amenities and personalized wellness programs.
Long description (500 characters): Canyon Ranch Woodside is nestled among towering redwoods, providing a serene environment for a deep connection with nature. The resort offers personalized wellness programs integrating fitness, nutrition, and mindfulness. Guests enjoy luxurious treehouse accommodations and a holistic wellness philosophy that enhances physical, mental, and spiritual well-being. The resort's tranquil forest setting is ideal for relaxation and outdoor activities.
USP 1 (description in less than 160 char: Experience tranquility among towering redwoods, fostering a deep connection with nature.
USP 2 (description in less than 160 char: Tailored wellness experiences integrating fitness, nutrition, and mindfulness.
USP 3 (description in less than 160 char: Stay in glass-clad treehouses for a unique lodging experience amidst the forest.
Health and wellness approach (less than: Canyon Ranch Woodside offers a holistic wellness philosophy integrating physical, mental, and spiritual well-being. Personalized programs include fitness classes, outdoor adventures, mindfulness practices, and spa treatments. The serene forest setting enhances the wellness journey, offering opportunities for reflection and connection with nature.
Nutrition approach (less than 500 charac: Emphasizing fresh, locally sourced ingredients, the resort offers balanced meals catering to diverse dietary preferences. Nutritionists provide personalized guidance to align food choices with wellness goals, promoting sustainable and enjoyable eating habits.
Exclusive benefits when booking with Ser: Serenity Ways clients enjoy exclusive amenities: upgrade on arrival, $100 USD hotel credit, early check-in/late check-out, and complimentary Wi-Fi.
Location highlights: Forest retreat; situated in the redwood forests of Northern California, ideal for relaxation and outdoor activities.
Access: Nearest airports: San Francisco International Airport (SFO) and San Jos√© Mineta International Airport (SJC), both 45 minutes away.
Family friendly ?: Guests must be at least 14 years old; additional age restrictions may apply.
Booking and payment policy: A deposit of 50% of the total amount is required to confirm the booking.
Cancellation policy: Cancellations made more than 14 days prior to arrival receive a full refund. Within 14 days, the deposit is forfeited.
